merchant_name.description: Needed by merchants/PSPs to change the charge description. Any chars above 25 are truncated. If the merchant name is less than 25 chars, it is right padded with whitespace before sent to the schemes

merchant_city.description: Contains the city of the merchant for card-present merchants and the merchant phone number for CNP merchants. Formatting rules applied as mentioned above

sub_merchant_id.description: Sub-merchant ID assigned by the Payment Facilitator.
